data.eml:eml: Pastinachus solocirostris sp. nov., a new species of Stingray (Elasmobranchii: Myliobatiformes) from the Indo-Malay Archipelago.

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Peter R. Last, B. Mabel Manjaji, Gordon K. Yearsley (2005): Pastinachus solocirostris sp. nov., a new species of Stingray (Elasmobranchii: Myliobatiformes) from the Indo-Malay Archipelago. Zootaxa 1040: 1-16, URL: http://www.zoobank.org/urn:lsid:zoobank.org:pub:756A36A1-95BC-4FD9-A58A-1DA0EAB3A830
